panelText.text: As an employee of Johnson Controls, you are expected to act in the company’s best interest and avoid conflicts of interest.
Conflicts harm companies because they create a situation where individuals may be tempted to pursue what’s best for them rather than what’s best for the company they are supposed to represent.
Whenever your circumstances change in a way that may cause a conflict of interest, you are responsible for disclosing the potential conflict immediately.
All potential conflicts of interest must be disclosed via a Conflicts of Interests Form on http://complianceforms.jci.com
Most potential conflicts can be managed, but it's essential to disclose them early so they can be reviewed and addressed appropriately.
